name: swampertite
effect: Held: Allows Swampert to Mega Evolve into Mega Swampert.
short_effect: Held: Allows Swampert to Mega Evolve into Mega Swampert.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Swampert hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.

to Mega Evolve during battle.
